quote: When you're young, all evolution lies before you, every road is open to you, and at the same time you can enjoy the fact of being there on the rock, flat mollusk-pulp, damp and happy.
quote_letters: WHEN YOURE YOUNG ALL EVOLUTION LIES BEFORE YOU EVERY ROAD IS OPEN TO YOU AND AT THE SAME TIME YOU CAN ENJOY THE FACT OF BEING THERE ON THE ROCK FLAT MOLLUSK-PULP DAMP AND HAPPY
